181122102925-statue-of-liberty-crown.title: Uptown China Restaurant
181122102925-statue-of-liberty-crown.text: Best Chinese Restaurant in Seattle. Located in lower Queen Anne, walking distance to Space Needle and other nearby attractions. Excellent food and very gracious service. Great Lunch specials that are served quickly.
181122102925-statue-of-liberty-crown.author: Click to Enter

170321135754-airport-security-line.title: Zheng Cafe Seattle
170321135754-airport-security-line.text: We started with scallion pancakes and dumplings. Both were fantastic. Both were extremely delicious with just the right amount of crunch. I loved my Singapore noodles - so flavorful and filled with veggies and a combination of meats. My son couldn't stop eating his beef brisket noodle soup - so much flavor thanks to the broth and fried garlic. My son enjoyed his Zheng Cafe Seattle style egg foo young over rice.
170321135754-airport-security-line.author: Click to Enter

181119170125-ploughgate-creamery-butter-.title: Bamboo Garden Vegetarian
181119170125-ploughgate-creamery-butter-.text: Very nice place to get authentic asian cuisine. All sorts of vegan options. The restaurant is vegetarian normally and has a full vegan menu with all the fixings. We started off with the fried spring rolls and they were very good. Main course we tried the pan fried noodles with tofu and my partner ordered the full house mix with all sorts of goodness.
181119170125-ploughgate-creamery-butter-.author: Click to Enter

181121164246-boeing-777-9x-assembly-1.title: Taste of Asia
181121164246-boeing-777-9x-assembly-1.text: I just liked their dishes. I always get great customer service there. The place is well kept and the staff members are always nice. Would recommend to others.
181121164246-boeing-777-9x-assembly-1.author: Click to Enter

170301162422-leaning-tower.title: Country Dough
170301162422-leaning-tower.text: The food was delicious!I ordered a bowl of Dan dan noodles and some fried dumplings.Quite tasty .However,the food did not include some veggies which made it became unhealthy and the fried dumplings were a little bit oily.The space inside the restaurant was limited too.I mean...this restaurant's services can be improved for a little bit to become perfect.
170301162422-leaning-tower.author: Click to Enter

181118211616-banasthali-vidyapith-aviati.title: On the Fly
181118211616-banasthali-vidyapith-aviati.text: My favorite fast lunch, and shockingly authentic-ish Chinese food (sitting next to General's Chicken, but hey). I love the pork, the eggs, and the veggies. Happy hour $2 off per pound is one of the best deals in town. I love this place!
181118211616-banasthali-vidyapith-aviati.author: Click to Enter
